weather.sunnyTip: On sunny days, monitor soil moisture more frequently as plants may dry out faster. Consider moving sensitive plants away from direct sunlight.
weather.rainyTip: Check drainage on potted plants during rainy periods to prevent root rot. Hold off on watering until soil dries out.
weather.cloudyTip: Cloudy days are perfect for repotting or transplanting as plants experience less stress without direct sunlight.
weather.windyTip: Consider bringing smaller potted plants indoors or providing shelter from strong winds. Check soil moisture as wind can dry plants out.
weather.clearTip: Clear days are great for plant maintenance. Check for pests, prune as needed, and ensure adequate watering.
